title: So Much Winning … For Renewable Energy, That Is
description:
When US President Trump declared a national energy emergency, renewable energy quickly rose to the occasion (coal, not so much).

The post So Much Winning … For Renewable Energy, That Is appeared first on CleanTechnica.
